item.description:
Hi Everyone,
In general i dont post bar places..
Kathy one of our members likes this place among countless otheres, I trust Kathy , she is a great person and goes here at times...so i will test list it this once..
Everyone, dont get any ideas im going to list every one of your faviourate bars in town...
Othere meetup groups do that all week long...thats their thing ...
Ok most have indicated this is the best place around..food, and fun..
i dont know, never went there, i guess someday i will just go to check it out...
cant critisize the atmosphere till i went there right ??

any way here is the details:

Here's the link for info on Black Eyed Sallys if anyone is interested in going Friday night:

http://www.blackeyeds...


Black Eyed Sallys - 350 Asylum St., Hartford, CT
Friday, Sept., 7th
"Michael Cleary Band" (rock/blues)
Cover: $5.00
Time: 9:30 pm
Parking (in lot across the street): $7.00

post the link if anyone wants to check it out!

Ok done..al-r

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Black Eyes Sally Bar
